getShortcutId(android.app.Notification).Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v4#content#pm#ShortcutInfoCompat#getId_E@ that this notification supersedes, if any.

getCategory(android.app.Notification).Description: Get the category of this notification in a backwards compatible manner.

getSortKey(android.app.Notification).Description: Get a sort key that orders this notification among other notifications from the same package. This can be useful if an external sort was already applied and an app would like to preserve this. Notifications will be sorted lexicographically using this value, although providing different priorities in addition to providing sort key may cause this value to be ignored. This sort key can also be used to order members of a notification group. See @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Builder#setGroup_E@.

getGroupAlertBehavior(android.app.Notifi.Description: Returns which type of notifications in a group are responsible for audibly alerting the user. See @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#GROUP_ALERT_ALL_E@, @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#GROUP_ALERT_CHILDREN_E@, @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#GROUP_ALERT_SUMMARY_E@.

Returns: the ID of the channel this notification posts to.

Parameters: int: The index of the action to retrieve.
getAction(android.app.Notification, int).Description: Get an action on this notification in a backwards compatible manner. Actions were supported from JellyBean (Api level 16) forwards.

getGroup(android.app.Notification).Description: Get the key used to group this notification into a cluster or stack with other notifications on devices which support such rendering.

getTimeoutAfter(android.app.Notification.Description: Returns the time at which this notification should be canceled by the system, if it's not canceled already.

getBadgeIconType(android.app.Notificatio.Description: Returns what icon should be shown for this notification if it is being displayed in a Launcher that supports badging. Will be one of @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#BADGE_ICON_NONE_E@, @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#BADGE_ICON_SMALL_E@, or @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#BADGE_ICON_LARGE_E@.

Returns: Whether this notification is a group summary.
isGroupSummary(android.app.Notification).Description: Get whether this notification to be the group summary for a group of notifications. Grouped notifications may display in a cluster or stack on devices which support such rendering. Requires a group key also be set using @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Builder#setGroup_E@.

getActionCount(android.app.Notification).Description: Get the number of actions in this notification in a backwards compatible manner. Actions were supported from JellyBean (Api level 16) forwards.

getExtras(android.app.Notification).Description: Gets the @B_android#app#Notification#extras_E@ field from a notification in a backwards compatible manner. Extras field was supported from JellyBean (Api level 16) forwards. This function will return null on older api levels.

getLocalOnly(android.app.Notification).Description: Get whether or not this notification is only relevant to the current device. Some notifications can be bridged to other devices for remote display. If this hint is set, it is recommend that this notification not be bridged.
